404.title: Page not found
404.description: Sorry we are not able to find this resource! You could just press this neat little button:

first.p2: OFFICIAL DISCUSSION SPACE OF YOUR UNIVERSITY
first.disclaimer: DONUT allows you to hang out and chat whatever the size of your community. Instant messaging smartly scaled for your campus, your organizations, your Meetups?

second.p1: YOUR COMMUNITY IS GROWING THROUGHOUT ALL ITS DISCUSSIONS.
second.p2: DONUT BRINGS YOU COMFORT TO ORGANIZE DISCUSSIONS AMONG YOUR MEMBERS

1.subtitle: Your own space
1.description: Gather your community members and all their discussions in a dedicated space. Everyone can easily find each other.

2.subtitle: Carefree access Management
2.description: Define access rules (public or private, custom criteria) and we automatically detect your members. End with one by one validation.

3.subtitle: Always zen
3.description: Your team moderators have a superpowers to prevent trolling.

4.subtitle: Your members are independent
4.description: They are free to create private or public discussions, to exchange documents ... Your community lives by itself.

5.subtitle: Members: no limit
5.description: Engage your community whether it has 30 or 100,000 members. DONUT is made for it !

6.subtitle: Keyboard-friendly
6.description: DONUT is available both on mobile and on computer. Because we think about the comfort of your eyes and your ten lovely fingers.

third.disclaimer: SO CREATE A SPACE THAT LOOKS LIKE YOUR COMMUNITY ON DONUT

text: We draw much of our inspiration in IRC, the chat system which allowed early Internet adopters to meet in on-line communities. We have nostalgia for that time and this vision of the Internet. Where, as in real life, we can chat with people around us, no matter if we are already "friends " or not. From the origin of this project we've wanted to revive this heyday of chat with our generation, and to introduce it the younger.

Furthermore we admire the the quality of instant messaging app enabling to chat with friends (Whatsapp, Viber, Facebook Messenger ...) or colleagues (Slack, HipChat ...). These tools are unfortunately not suitable for communities discussions.
Our mission at DONUT is to provide communities, and especially university campuses, the best experience of instant chat.

welcome.subject: Welcome to DONUT.me! Your account was successfully created

content.title: Welcome to DONUT !
content.disclaimer: Congratulations! Your user account was successfully created. Now you can join us and chat around a tasty donut by clicking right here

content.title: Password reset on DONUT.me
content.disclaimer: You are receiving this e-mail because you have requested a password reset. Please click on the following link to complete the process
content.info: If you ignore this e-mail your password will remain unchanged

content.title: Validate email on DONUT.me
content.disclaimer: Email activation will be effective for @__username__ account. To activate your email you should click on the link below

passwordchanged.subject: Success ! Your password has been successfully changed

content.title: Password update
content.disclaimer: You are receiving this e-mail as the final confirmation of your password change. Let's go back to DONUT.me and join tasty conversations!

emailchanged.subject: Success ! The e-mail linked to your DONUT.me account has been successfully changed

content.title: Email update
content.disclaimer: You are receiving this e-mail because you requested to change the e-mail linked to yout DONUT.me account. It worked perfectly! You can use it to log in:

roomop.subject: You were promoted to moderator in __roomname__

content.title: You were promoted to moderator in __roomname__
content.disclaimer: Kudos! You are now a moderator in
content.disclaimer2: It's time to practice your new super powers.

roomdeop.subject: You are no longer a moderator of __roomname__

content.title: You are no longer a moderator of __roomname__
content.disclaimer: Don't panic you'r still a member of __roomname__ !

content.title: You were kicked out of __roomname__ by @__username__
content.disclaimer: That can't be a big deal. The two of you just give a big hug and everything will be fine again!

content.title: You were banned from __roomname__ by @__username__
content.disclaimer:
It looks like you were not meant to be together...
But you'll be fine, one lost ten found. Just pick another donut!

roomdeban.subject: You are no longer banned from __roomname__

content.title: You are no longer banned from __roomname__
content.disclaimer: You are no longer banned from
content.disclaimer2: It looks like all is well that ends well!

content.title: You are unmute in __roomname__
content.disclaimer: Now can write as much as you want. Enjoy !
content.action: ... and all of that thanks to

content.title: You are mute in __roomname__
content.disclaimer: You have been muted in
content.disclaimer4: should unmute you very shortly. Meanwhile pick a donut and join another discussion!
content.action: ... and all of that thanks to

content.title: @__username__ joined __roomname__
content.disclaimer: This is one more! Let's go welcome this marvelous person the right way :).

content.title: @__username__ ask for allowance in __roomname__
content.disclaimer: Looks like your donut have great success!
content.info: To accept or refuse his request go to "Access" menu from __roomname__.

content.title: Your request to join __roomname__ have been granted. You can now access to this donut !
content.disclaimer: You can now enjoy this donut !

content.title: Your access request to #__roomname__ have been refused
content.disclaimer: Don't worry you can make another request to join this donut later !

roominvite.subject: An user invites you to join __roomname__

content.title: @__username__ invites you to join __roomname__
content.disclaimer: You can join his room right now!

content.title: @__username__ create __roomname__
content.disclaimer: Your community had more and more donut !
content.info: You can delete this donut on his profile page

content.title: Your donut __roomname__ has been deleted
content.disclaimer: Looks like your donut has been a problem, do not hesitate to speak @__username__ !

content.title: @__username__ has defined a new topic in __roomname__
content.disclaimer: You must a thousand things to say about it!

content.title: @__username__ mentionned you in __roomname__
content.disclaimer: It's always cool to have people thinking about you! Think about replying.

content.title: @__username__ ask for membership in #__groupname__
content.disclaimer: Looks like your donut have great success!
content.info: To accept or refuse his request go to "Access" menu from #__groupname__.

content.title: You are now a member of #__groupname__
content.disclaimer: Your request to join #__groupname__ has been accepted. You are now member of this community. You can access to all donut reserved for members and you can create your. Many talks possibility.

groupdisallow.subject: You are not longer a member of #__groupname__

content.title: You are not longer a member of #__groupname__
content.disclaimer: Everything is not lost, you can still talk in yours active conversations in this community. You can also join public donut and get invite in private donut.

groupinvite.subject: An user invites you to join #__groupname__

content.title: @__username__ invites you to join #__groupname__
content.disclaimer: You can join his community right now!

content.title: Your access request to #__groupname__ have been refused
content.disclaimer: Don't worry you can make another request to join this community later !

content.title: You have been banned of community #__groupname__

groupdeban.subject: You are no longer banned of #__groupname__

content.title: You are no longer banned from community #__groupname__
content.disclaimer: It looks like all is well that ends well!

content.disclaimer: Kudos! You are now a moderator in

content.disclaimer: Don't panic you're still a member of #__groupname__. So you can create your donut in this community and join the donut accessible for members.

message: DONUT is in pre-launch phase. We tried our best to offer you the friendliest experience but you probably have an idea how to make things even better. Drop us a line on #donut.
Let's get started! Pick a donut and chat with people sharing your interests:
welcome.donotshowagain: Do not show this message again

group-create.title: Community's creation
group-create.content:
Congrats ! This is your homepage where your members can see all the members, and all the donuts of your community.

We created your first donut: #__groupname__/welcome. It is public so anyone (even non-members) can join it. Take a minute to customize your profile and configure who can access your community
